about_the_game:
A narrative-driven platformer that lets you choose between action or adventure.

After letting his girlfriend down for the last time, Billy is swiftly dumped on his two-year anniversary. While moping home alone in the rain, a mysterious portal swallows Billy up and abandons him on a distant planet.

Here, Billy will learn to become the dependable person he should have always been.

Oh, and he'll also uncover an ancient alien prophecy and save the world, too.

Billy Saves the World is a comedic, sci-fi love story that spans time and space, inspired by the whimsy of Monkey Island and Futurama. Written, directed, and designed by award-winning filmmaker, Cooper Bibaud.



CHOOSE BETWEEN TWO DISTINCT GAMEPLAY STYLES: Progress through all five story chapters by leaning toward action-platforming OR slow things down seamlessly and use your head by leaning toward a puzzle-adventure game. Play how YOU prefer.

Every quest, every level, every moment, has multiple outcomes, solutions, or gameplay approaches.



  • Run, Slide, Jump, Rocket-Boost, Wall-Jump, and use Jedi-like super powers to explore a small but dense 2D metroidvania-style open world, featuring 7+ diverse biomes with beautifully hand drawn environments and animation from top film & tv professionals.
  • Solve over 25 side-quests with multiple dialogue branches, solutions and outcomes based on what you say and do.
  • Packed with 30+ optional levels to discover and explore, each containing different routes, unique enemies, deadly traps, creative puzzles, secret collectibles, and nail biting time trials.
  • Optional upgrades including 6 Heart Pieces (each with unique benefits) and over 7 special abilities to acquire.
  • Featuring one of the year's best soundtracks, composed by John McMillan (Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag) and multi-platinum producer Tom Ratesic (Nicki Minaj, Lil Wayne). And audio by Jonathan Beres (Game of Thrones).

Join the official Discord channel for the latest news & announcements, chat directly with the creator, PLUS receive exclusive videos, images, WIPs and more.
